attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has been a few cases reported in the news recently where child abusers have been given a light sentance , this isnt fair a child who has been abused has to live with it for life I want to Campaign for tougher sentances for these abusers

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
